data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="ScriptingService" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="scripting"  i18nKey="service-description"  resourceName="scripting"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/ScriptingService"  serviceVersion="24b09aa8-a51c-4ccf-a07c-9a9dd08eeefd" >
            <Global hideConfigUI="no"  validate="yes" >
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="g101"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="defaultScriptContext"  order="900"  resourceName="defaultContext"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice" >
                    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="script-type-01" >POLICY_CONDITION</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="script-type-02" >AUTHENTICATION_SERVER_SIDE</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="script-type-03" >AUTHENTICATION_CLIENT_SIDE</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="script-type-04" >OIDC_CLAIMS</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="script-type-05" >AUTHENTICATION_TREE_DECISION_NODE</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="script-type-06" >OAUTH2_ACCESS_TOKEN_MODIFICATION</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>POLICY_CONDITION</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="scriptContext"  realmCloneable="yes"  resourceName="contexts"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >

                        <ChoiceValues>

                            <Value>GROOVY</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="st103"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="defaultScript"  order="1200"  propertiesViewBeanURL="../ui-admin/%23realms/{0}/scripts/edit/{1}"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice"  uitype="globalScriptSelect" >
                        <ChoiceValues>
                            <ChoiceValuesClassName className="org.forgerock.openam.scripting.service.ScriptChoiceValues" >

                                    <Attribute name="GlobalOnly" ></Attribute>
                                    <Value>true</Value>

                            </ChoiceValuesClassName>

                    </AttributeSchema>
                    <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="ec100"  inheritance="single"  maintainPriority="no"  name="engineConfiguration"  realmCloneable="yes"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >

                            <DefaultValues>
